==== computedPropertiesNarrowed.ts (9 errors) ====

    declare function assert(n: number): asserts n is 1;
    assert(x);
    export let o = {
               ~

!!! related TS9027 computedPropertiesNarrowed.ts:4:12: Add a type annotation to the variable o.
